EmailTemplate.subject: In Conversation: A Retail CEO’s POV on Extreme In-Store Experiences
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> The pandemic accelerated retail transformation and new in-store shopping demands are here to stay. Our “Driving Extreme Convenience at Retail: Why and Why Now?” panel discussion, moderated by Clifford Gumkowski – VP Americas for NCR Retail sales, features: - Neil Stern (CEO, The Good Food Holdings) - Amanda Lai (Food and Retail Practice Lead, McMillanDoolittle) and - Kalyna Stiles (Global Senior Director of Store Transformation, NCR) Tune in to hear their perspectives on:  - How the shift towards extremes has changed the retail industry; - New challenges retailers are facing; and - Practical solutions available to retailers now. Join us on August 11 and learn how to deliver value, convenience and a great experience in your store.
